content: Like the rest of the Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong, this one can't be upgraded, so you are stuck with its basic level of strength. Therefore, you will want to switch to other Curios items if you want a better ability or want one that fits your build more.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tridacna_Pendant.md', within the main section titled 'Tridacna Pendant'.
The content is as follows:
Like the rest of the Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong, this one can't be upgraded, so you are stuck with its basic level of strength. Therefore, you will want to switch to other Curios items if you want a better ability or want one that fits your build more.
